item.description: NEBO (North End BOston) sounds like the right place for NEEM to begin. (website: www.neborestaurant.com ) Though it's actually on the fringe of the North End, at 90 North Washington St., diagonally across the street from Joe Tecce's. (From North Station, walk down Causeway St. toward the North End, but before you get to the large intersection at the bridge, go right on N.Washington. It's a 5-minute walk.) We'll call this event an upscale pizza party and it will serve as a meet 'n' greet for us to get acquainted. We'll meet at the near end of the bar for drinks from 6:00-6:45. At 6:45 we'll start ordering pizzas based on how many people are there at that time. If you want to have pizza, just let me have $5 when you check in with me. If you want something else, you're on your own paying for it. And everyone's on their own for drinks. You may come at whatever time is convenient for you from 6:00-8:00. At about 8:30, for those with the time, we'll take a stroll down Hanover St. and stop in at a cafe for cappuccino, espresso, a sweet or whatever you're up for. It should be fun. IMPORTANT: Please access the About tab for event guidelines. Thank you.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the near end of the bar.
item.name: NEBO- North End BOston
